channel.title: Posts on Rob Marissen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Rob Marissen

item.title: Switched to HUGO
item.description: This site now uses HUGO with the Ezhil theme. The HUGO way of building a static website fits my way of working much more than the standard GitHub way using Jekyll.

item.title: The half-life of an age related protein
item.description: As a Sunday morning project, I have tried to resolve a question that has been bothering me for some time.
